author: Monica Gutierrez
text:
Good afternoon,
The City of Tracy is exploring ways to consolidate four city commissions.  Does anyone have any insight or best practices that outline the most innovative way to consolidate commissions?  
For example, rather than having a senior commission, youth commission and arts commission a general commission would be created with one representative from each population/group?
Any and all insight is appreciated!  Thank you.
title: City Commission Consolidation
